subject: Baseball
Football
Cards and Card Games
Trading Cards
lead_paragraph: By day, Rex Ryan was one of the N.F.L.’s more creative defensive coaches. By night, he would scour the Internet for  Strat-O-Matic player-card sets that had eluded his collection.
